name: Tsunami Surf Shop & Water Gear Superstore
overview: Tsunami Surfboards, Inc. offers nothing but the best products when it comes to surfboarding. We have a wide selection of your basic shortboards and longboards, plus a number of modern surfboard variations. TsunamiSurfboards.com also sells surfboarding accessories and apparels for men, women and kids. Customers can also avail of training products like DVDs and VHS which are perfect for beginners. Store owner, Greg Knoll just loves hanging out by the beach. He into all sorts of water sports and activities like swimming, jet skiing, water skiing, diving, snorkeling, and of course, surfing. He enjoys catching waves with his fun board together with his surfing buddies, trying out all kinds of stunts and tricks. He started TsunamiSurfboards when he was 17 because he loves helping people find the best surf gear around.
